## 156. BOAR
### Definition
A representative of the family of the <i>Suidae </i>(pigs) family that is least marked in a given culture. In Daghestan, this usually means a wild boar (<i>Sus scrofa</i>). In regions with developed domestic pig farming, enter the term for the domestic pig (<i>Sus scrofa domesticus</i>) instead.

### Contexts
1. Boars/pigs have trampled down the field. 2. Muslims are not allowed to eat the meat of pigs/boars.
